snippet: First-person shooters, from retro to sophisticated. Also, Foursquare’s Swarm app comes to Windows Phone.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column compares first-person shooter games that are now available for smartphones; notes that Foursquare has moved its check-in and meet-with-friends service to new app called Swarm.
lead_paragraph: First-person shooters, from retro to sophisticated. Also, Foursquare’s Swarm app comes to Windows Phone.

headline.print_headline: Games for Your Itchy Trigger Finger
headline.main: Games for Your Itchy Trigger Finger
